Translations.Text: M
â€˜A. S. Q
inspir vi those antaux vi est DI Almighty Sagx
Him aparten cxio heavens cxio sur ter Li est plej Alt des Great
heavens them preskaux frakas reverence Him angxel lauxd glor their Lord ili pet forgiveness those ter! Absolutely DI est Forgiver Merciful
Those set ali lords Him DI est 1 charge de them; vi ne est their advokat
Ni tiel reveal vi Arabic Quran avert central community gxi avert Tag de Summoning ke est inevitable. Kelk end Heaven kelk en Infer
Hav DI willed Li far them 1 community! Sed Li redeems His mercy whomever Li vol. As por transgressors ili ne hav mastr nor helper
Ili trov Did ali lords Him? DI est NUR Lord Mastr Li est Unu resurrects dead Li est Omnipotent
Vi disput any part de this message judgment por doing this ripoz DI! Such est DI my Lord En Him mi fid Him mi submit
Initiator de heavens ter. Li kre vi el yourselves spouses - Kaj ankaux por best. Li tiel proviz vi means multiply tie est nothing ke egal Him. Li est Hearer Seer
Al Him aparten absolut control de heavens ter! Li est Unu increases provision whomever Li vol redukt gxi. Li est fully aware da all ajx

Li dekret vi sam religi dekret Noah ki ni inspir vi ki ni dekret Abraham Moses Jesus Vi uphold this 1 religi ne divid gxi idol worshipers mult resent ki vi invit them do DI redeems Himself whomever LI VOL; LI DIREKT Himself NUR those totally submit

Ironically ili romp sects nur post knowledge ven them due al jealousy resentment themselves. Gxi est por predetermined decision el your Lord respite them fora definite interim ili jugx tuj! Ja later generaci hered scripture est plen de dub

This est ki vi predik steadfastly argument ki vi komand do ne sekv their wishes Proklam mi kred en all scriptures send DI! Mi komand jugx vi equitably. DI est our Lord your Lord Ni hav our deeds vi hav your deeds. tie ne est argument us vi. DI testament gather us all together AL Him est ultimate destiny
Those who argue DI post ricev His message their argument nullified their Lord Ili incurred condemnation ind severe retribution
DI EST 1 who SEND scripture liver truth LEGX. all vi kon Hor (Tag Judgment est tre close)
Challenging gxi est those ne kred en gxi. As por those kred ili koncern gxi ili kon ti gxi est truth! Absolutely those deny Hor ir far astray
DI EST fully aware da all His creatures; LI proviz por whomever LI VOL. Li est Powerful Almighty
Whoever streb rekompenc Hereafter ni multiply rekompenc him! whoever streb sxtof this mond ni don him therefrom tiam li ne ricev akci Hereafter
Ili sekv idols dekret them religious legx neniam authorized DI. Se est por predetermined decision ili jugx tuj! Ja transgressors incurred painful retribution
Vi seg transgressors worried cxio ili committed cxio ven haunt them! As por those kred plumb righteous life ili est gxarden Paradise! Ili ricev whatever ili wish their Lord This est great ben

This est bon news el DI His servants kred plumb righteous life! dir mi ne pet vi any wage Mi pet each da vi sorb zorg da your own relativ. Anyone does righteous work ni multiply his rekompenc gxi. DI est Forgiver Appreciative
Ili dir Li (Rashad) est fabricated mensog DI!? Di willed Li sigel your mens DI erases falsehood affirms truth His vort! Li est fully aware da innermost thoughts
Li est Unu akcept repentance His servants remits pek. Li est fully aware da cxio vi do
Respond Him est those kred plumb righteous life! Li dusx them His blessings. As por disbelievers ili incurred severe retribution
Se DI increased provision His servants ili transgress ter. This est Li send gxi precisely mezur whomever Li vol. Li est fully Cognizant Seer His servants
Li est 1 who send pluv post ili despaired stern His mercy! Li est nur Mastr Praiseworthy
Among His proofs est creation de heavens ter creatures Li stern them. Li est able al summon them when Li vol
Anything mav ke okaz vi est consequence your own deeds Li overlooks many (da your pek)
Vi neniam escape vi hav neniom DI as Lord Mastr
Among His proofs est sxip vel mar vel flag
Se Li willed Li ankoraux vent las them motionless sur top da akv. These est proofs those est steadfast appreciative
Li annihilate them consequence their own works Instead Li overlooks many (da their pek)
Those who argue our proofs do gxi trov out ti ili ne hav basis
Whatever vi don est ne plur than temporary sxtof this life. Ki DI posed est far put everlasting those kred fid their Lord
Ili evit gross pek vice kaj when angered ili forgive
Ili respond their Lord per observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat)! Their afer decid due consultation themselves kaj our provisions them ili don charity
When gross injustice befalls them ili bud their dekstr
Just requital injustice est ekvivalent retribution those who pardon argument righteousness rekompenc DI! Li ne am des unjust
Certainly those bud their dekstr when injustice befalls them ne committing any error
wrong unu est those trakt popol unjustly resort al aggression provocation! These incurred painful retribution
Resorting pacienc forgiveness reflects prav strength karakter
Whomever DI send astray neniam trov vol any ali lord vi seg such transgressors when ili seg retribution dir ni get another sxanc
Vi seg them vizagx gxi humiliated debased rigard pen evit rigard! Those kred proklam efektiv losers est those perd their anim their famili Tag Resurrection. transgressors ind everlasting retribution
tie ne est allies help them DI! Whomever DI send astray neniam direkt
Vi respond your Lord tag ven which dekret inevitable DI! tie ne est rifugx vi ke tag nor advokat

Ili turn ni ne send vi their guardian Your pland misi liver message When ni dusx human beings kun mercy, ili igx fier when adversity aflikt them consequence their own deeds human beings turn into disbelievers
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter! Li kre whatever Li vol granting daughters al whomever Li vol granting fil whomever Li vol
Li hav vir females marry each ali tiam render whomever Li vol sterile Li est Omniscient Omnipotent
Ne human est komunik DI escept inspiration behind barrier send messenger tra Li reveals ki Li vol. Li est plej Alt Sagx
Tiel ni inspir vi revelation proklam our commandments! Vi ne hav ide scripture faith. Ni far this beacon direkt whomever ni choose our servants. Surely vi direkt rekt path
path DI al whom aparten cxio heavens cxio ter. Absolutely all materi controlled DI
